## Proposed Solution

- Add horizontal scrolling or hide overflow where needed to prevent content from spilling outside its container.

- Use flexible widths (like max-width: 100%) instead of fixed sizes to make sure the layout adjusts well on different screen sizes.

- Place wide content like tables inside scrollable boxes if necessary, so they don't break the layout.

- Double-check padding and box sizing to make sure they donâ€™t accidentally push content beyond its container.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12732
activity.text:
hey @AdityaJ2305 @nihal467 

I will like to work on this issue.

Proposed Solution:
- Refactor the Medication table layout to use responsive design principles (e.g., overflow-x: auto on the table container, max-width constraints).

- Apply proper table column sizing and ensure action buttons (Print, Edit) remain visible at all screen sizes.

- Fix layout of the "Ongoing" tab by identifying and removing elements causing unnecessary horizontal scroll.

Estimated Completion: 1 days

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12693
activity.text:
@nihal467 @Jacobjeevan  I'm interested in working on this issue and would like to contribute a fix.

Proposed Solution:

I wanted to work on this by updating the validation logic to allow medicine administration, when the administration timestamp is equal to or later than medicine added .Hence, this includes modifying the date comparison logic in the form validation (to use appropriate comparison operator).

Expected Timeline:

ETA: 1-2 days

This fix avoids false validation errors. Could you please assign this to me???
